alt: Joint military parade of forces celebrating the 70th anniversary of Dien Bien Phu victory. Photo: Giang Huy
article_heading: No parade to celebrate the 80th anniversary of the founding of the Vietnam People's Army
description: The image depicts a group of military personnel in formation. They are dressed in camouflage uniforms, which are predominantly green and brown, with red and yellow accents. Each soldier is wearing a cap with a badge, and the badge on the cap appears to be a star or a symbol of some sort. The soldiers are holding rifles with bayonets attached, and they are wearing white gloves. The soldiers are standing in a line, with their bodies facing forward and their heads turned slightly to the side, as if they are looking at something or someone. The background is blurred, but it seems to be an outdoor setting with trees and a clear sky. The soldiers' expressions are serious, and they seem to be in a state of readiness or alertness.

alt: General Vo Nguyen Giap and his wife Dang Bich Ha. Photo: Tran Hong
article_heading: General Vo Nguyen Giap's wife rests in peace at Vung Chua - Yen Island
description: The image depicts an intimate scene of two individuals sharing a meal. The setting appears to be a cozy indoor space, possibly a home, with a table covered in a floral tablecloth. The table is adorned with various dishes and utensils, including bowls, cups, and a spoon, suggesting a meal in progress.  On the left, there is an older woman with dark hair, wearing a purple top. She is holding a spoon and appears to be enjoying her meal. Her expression is one of contentment and engagement with the food.  On the right, there is an older man with white hair, wearing a light-colored shirt. He is holding a bowl and seems to be in the process of eating. His focus is on the food, indicating that he is actively consuming his meal.  In the background, there is a fan, which suggests that the room might be warm or that the fan is used for comfort. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of warmth and familiarity, capturing a moment of everyday life.

alt: General Secretary President and his wife at Noi Bai airport this morning. Photo: VNA
article_heading: General Secretary and President departs for US and Cuba tour
description: The image depicts two individuals, a man and a woman, standing on the stairs of an airplane. The man is on the left and the woman is on the right. Both are waving with their left hands raised, suggesting a friendly or welcoming gesture. The man is wearing a dark suit with a tie, and the woman is dressed in a vibrant red dress with a pattern that appears to be floral. The airplane has a blue exterior with some text and symbols visible, indicating it might be a commercial aircraft. The background is mostly white, which could be the sky or a plain background, and there are no other people or significant objects in the immediate vicinity. The overall impression is that of a moment captured during a flight, possibly at the beginning or end of the journey.

alt: Delegates attending the Central Conference. Photo: Hoang Phong
article_heading: Announcement of three working days of the 10th Conference of the 13th Central Committee
description: The image depicts an interior view of a legislative assembly or parliament chamber. The chamber is filled with rows of desks, each occupied by a member of parliament. The desks are arranged in a semi-circular fashion, facing towards the front of the chamber where the speaker's podium is likely located. The members are dressed in formal attire, with many wearing dark suits and ties. The chamber has a red carpet, and the walls are adorned with decorative elements, including what appears to be a floral arrangement. The lighting is bright, and the overall atmosphere suggests a formal and serious legislative session. There are no visible texts or logos in the image.

alt: General Secretary and President To Lam delivers the closing speech. Photo: Hoang Phong
article_heading: The Central Committee agreed to strongly innovate the work of organizing cadres.
description: The image shows a man standing at a podium with microphones, suggesting he is giving a speech or presentation. The man appears to be middle-aged, with short, graying hair. He is wearing a dark suit with a white shirt and a red tie. The background is blurred, but it appears to be an indoor setting with a red curtain, which could indicate a formal event or conference. The man's expression is serious, and he seems to be focused on his speech.

alt: Delegates attending the 10th Central Conference of the 13th term. Photo: Hoang Phong
article_heading: The Central Committee agreed to strongly innovate the work of organizing cadres.
description: The image depicts an indoor scene where a group of individuals are seated in an assembly hall. The room is filled with rows of red chairs, and the people are dressed in formal attire, with many wearing suits and ties. The audience members are clapping their hands, suggesting that they are applauding or showing approval for something happening out of the frame. The setting appears to be a legislative assembly or a similar formal meeting place, given the structured arrangement of the seating and the attire of the attendees. The room has a formal and solemn atmosphere, with a focus on the proceedings taking place.

alt: Panorama of the closing session. Photo: Hoang Phong
article_heading: The Central Committee agreed to strongly innovate the work of organizing cadres.
description: The image depicts an interior view of a large hall, which appears to be a conference or assembly room. The room is filled with rows of desks, each occupied by an individual who seems to be seated and facing towards the front of the room. The desks are arranged in a semi-circular pattern, suggesting that the room is designed for presentations or speeches.  At the front of the room, there is a stage with a podium and a microphone, indicating a space for speakers or performers. On the stage, there are several potted plants and a floral arrangement, adding a decorative touch to the setting.  The walls of the room are adorned with banners and flags, including a prominent red banner with a hammer and sickle symbol, which is associated with the Soviet Union. There is also a banner with text in Vietnamese, suggesting that the event is taking place in Vietnam or is related to Vietnamese culture or politics.  The room is well-lit, with natural light coming in from the windows, and there are clocks on the walls indicating the time. The overall atmosphere of the room is formal and serious, with the attendees dressed in business attire. The presence of the flags and the style of the room suggest that this could be a political or governmental assembly.

alt: Mr. Ha Quoc Tri. Photo: Xuan Thanh
article_heading: The Central Inspection Commission has two more members.

The man is looking slightly to his left with a focused expression, suggesting he is engaged in his speech. The background is simple and nondescript, with a blue curtain to the left and a plain wall to the right, which puts the emphasis on the man and his activity. alt: Opening session of the 10th conference of the 13th Party Central Committee. Photo: Nhat Bac

The benches are occupied by individuals, some of whom appear to be engaged in discussion or listening to a speaker. The chamber is adorned with a large, red flag with a hammer and sickle emblem, suggesting a communist or socialist political context. Above the flag, there is a banner with text that is not fully legible, but it seems to be related to a specific event or occasion. The room is illuminated by recessed lighting, and the walls are painted in a warm color, possibly orange or light brown. The overall atmosphere suggests a formal or official meeting or session.

alt: A motorcyclist in Hanoi is asked to blow into a breathalyzer. Photo: Hoang Phong
article_heading: Officials and civil servants who violate alcohol concentration will be disciplined.
description: The image depicts a scene where a man in a uniform, possibly a traffic officer or a security personnel, is interacting with another individual. The uniformed man is wearing a red hat with a badge, a light-colored jacket, and a face mask. He is holding a device that appears to be a handheld radio or walkie-talkie, and he is using it to scan or check the other person's helmet.  The person being checked is wearing a black helmet with a visor, suggesting they might be a motorcyclist or a construction worker. The helmet has some stickers or decals on it, indicating it might be used for a specific purpose or brand.  The setting appears to be an outdoor area with a paved surface, and there are vehicles in the background, including a car and a truck. The presence of vehicles and the attire of the individuals suggest this could be a work zone or a checkpoint.  The interaction between the two individuals seems to be focused on safety or compliance, with the uniformed officer ensuring that the other person's helmet meets safety standards or is authorized for use in the area. The officer's use of the radio or walkie-talkie could indicate that he is coordinating with other personnel or reporting the outcome of the check.

alt: General Secretary and President To Lam. Photo: Giang Huy
article_heading: General Secretary and President To Lam is about to visit the US and Cuba.
description: The image shows a man standing against a backdrop of red and yellow fabric, which appears to be a flag. The man is wearing a dark suit with a white shirt and a blue tie. He has short, graying hair and is looking directly at the camera with a slight smile. The flag behind him has a star design, which is a common motif in national flags. The man's attire and the flag suggest a formal or ceremonial setting.
